Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure that this was ligit but it seems to be working fine...ThanksAnd the shipping was fast...Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Cool Touchscreen Phone!
Reviews.Author: siempresuamor
Reviews.Content: These phone are so neat I bought 3 of them. The latest sprint update lets you use SDHC cards so I've got 8 gigs in mine plus there are lots of free apps out there for the palm. I use google maps and the word apps everyday at work.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Sharen Alexander
Reviews.Content: great phone. doesn't take sim card, gave to sister who loves it! thanks for a great deal. i love this site

Reviews.Title: Palm is a thing of the past.........
Reviews.Author: Ron Boudreau
Reviews.Content: It cost the same as a Smartphone per month to activate. So Palm is a thing of the past if your going to pay $60. to $100. per month get the new smart phone that dose all of what the Palm dose and lotes more.

Reviews.Title: Used Parts
Reviews.Author: William W. Whelan "Wiz"
Reviews.Content: Only problem it is a sprint phone .  I have Verizion.  Maybe if i change the Sim card I can use it.  Right now I am using to charge my battery and using the extra battery that came with it. Why ? because my other treo is not working right.  Dropped it. Lost a part.  Can not charge it.
